data.displayName: Amber Small Business Plan (Extra Small Usage)

fees.description: Membership of $25 per month (inc. GST) to access these wholesale rates.
A $16 (inc. GST) fee applies if full payment has not been received by the invoice due date
A $3 (inc. GST) fee applies if payment is dishonoured or reversed.
A fee of 1% applies to payments made by credit or debit card
Standard Connection Fee. Actual charges passed through from your distributor may vary, see www.amber.com.au/fees for more information
Standard Disconnection Fee. Actual charges passed through from your distributor may vary, see www.amber.com.au/fees for more information

electricityContract.terms: For full terms and conditions, visit https://www.amber.com.au/terms. If you do not have a smart meter we will install one for you. Available to small business customers with estimated imports or exports (whichever is greater) up to 10MWh per year (as calculated quarterly by Amber), in Evoenergy's distribution region with a flat rate tariff. For illustrative purposes, tariff 040 assumed. Feed-In Tariffs only valid if applicable.
electricityContract.variation: Usage prices change every 5 or 30 minutes depending on meter type, and are charged to you at the same costs charged to us. Prices determined by a range of factors, including government rebates, network fees and wholesale market costs. General Usage rate applies only if you are on a network flat rate tariff. If your average usage rate over a calendar quarter exceeds the c/kWh maximum rate listed below General Usage, we reduce your bill so that the total does not exceed the maximum rate.

greenPowerCharges.description: 100% GreenPower for 3.01 cents/kWh (inc. GST) option avaliable. See website for more information.

solarFeedInTariff.description: Wholesale price with guaranteed min of 0c/kWh over a 12 month period.

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Amber Offers no lock in contracts or exit fees. Prices may vary in accordance with the terms and conditions.
electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: Standard fees are listed www.amber.com.au/fees, but additional service costs passed through from distributors may vary.
